I have a very refined pallet and find that the food at Red Robin satisfies all six of my senses. If you are looking to impress a date, I would suggest bringing them here. The classic American and red ambiance suggests a comfortable and high class vibe that's exudes sexiness. The onion rings are the perfect starter and really set the tone for your evening. Crisped to perfection, the onion rings are amazing wether you are sitting in this fine establishment or at home in bed with your dogs. I actually credit the onion rings to curing my herpes. There truly is a spiritual aspect to this restaurant. I have never felt so close to God than I have in here. If you're looking for a fine dining experience that allows you to abandon your worries at the door, Red Robin is the establishment for you. God bless you Red Robin. Xoxo

Things were pretty good today. We we're there with a large group and only had one waitress. Despite that, she was able to keep up and take care of all of us at the same time. I hate when half a group gets food and the rest isn't ready. Do you eat? Do you let your food get cold? The food was good, so I'm bumping them up a star.

This is my favorite place to get a veggie burger because it's the only place that serves the Boca patty (that I know of). I usually get the gourmet cheese burger with the Boca patty but they can substitute the Boca patty in any of their burgers. Another reason I love coming here is for their unlimited fries and their speckled lemonade. If you like honey mustard, this place has some of the best honey mustard I have ever had. For dessert we got the DOH-nuts which are basically cronuts served with chocolate sauce and berry sauce. If you are a fan of cronuts I would definitely recommend them. I am a HUGE fan of their mud pie so if you are a chocolate lover, I would get that.  Service was great tonight considering only one person was needing to take care of everyone sitting in the entire bar. I will definitely be coming back.

Came for the Avo-cabo Salad, and my server said that due to the recent increase in avocado prices, there won't be any  on my salad. REALLY!*  I really think that with my salad cost of $10.99 (which, we all know what it would cost if I made my own, right?) along with the million dollar business they do.......OMG!!!! GO BUY SOME STUPID AVOCADOS FOR HEAVEN SAKE. How lame and cheap is that? At least give me a discount right???
Red robin it's always a great stop.  Good is always good.  Thanks to Andrew for the awesome service.

Took my dad here for Veterans' Day where he enjoyed a free double burger and endless fries.  Just wanted to say thanks Red Robin for celebrating those who have given their all for our freedom! I enjoyed the Red Robin Cheeseburger and endless fries- super yummy!

I decided to take advantage of the special Veterans Day meal at this location on Friday Nov. 11th 2016 and had a great experience.   I knew going in that being a Friday, the wait would be long.  I was given the option of going to the bar, but it too was full.  The hostess told me that the wait would be 15 minutes and it was accurate.  On a busy Friday, 15 minutes is a more than acceptable wait period to sit down.   Once seated, I was told that my server, Jess, would be with me shortly.  She walked over within 1-2 minutes and greeted me warmly and was very friendly.  I made sure the Veterans Day special was still in effect and it was.  She made sure to thank me for my service and asked if I wanted bacon on my burger, something I wouldn't have thought of, and decided for it.  I also added a banana shake and asked for Red Robin's special campfire sauce.  All requests were met with enthusiasm and were fulfilled promptly.    The first item that arrived was my shake.  She brought it out and explained that there might have been some brownie chunks that fell in due to other shakes being above it.  She asked me if I wanted another and I declined.  She made it very clear that if I wanted another she'd be more than happy to replace it.   The shake was plentiful and the banana flavoring was top notch with a great consistency.  When my meal came out, the fries were hot and fresh and the burger was great.  Cooked to my liking and the bacon added gave it that extra crunch that I really enjoyed.  I appreciated Jess's suggestion.   I was checked on throughout the meal ensuring I had everything I needed and was thoroughly taken care of.  My experiences at this particular location are always great, but this time was above average.    Jessica is a very attentive and professional server and she has continued the chain of great experiences at this location to ensure that I go back whenever I want a great meal.    Well done!

Honestly I don't get their burgers. Not that I don't like them, but because I enjoy the salads. My go to is the Avo-cab-o but I changed it up and got the crispy chicken tender salad. It was so good!  The amount given is perfect. For drinks I always get the iced tea. It's brewed just right and never tastes burnt. When can I go back?

Usually Red Robin takes awhile (30 minutes) to get seated BUT during Happy Hour you'll get seated right away even though I didn't sit at the bar. The host was nice and my waiter, John, was super friendly! When my soda was half way done, he came with a new soda. My meal tasted delicious! I got the Bacon Cheeseburger!!!! So good haha overall experience was very satisfying! Good customer service and good food!!! Good job guys!

I love that they do bottomless fries and freckled strawberry lemonade. The fries are thick cut and are similar to steak fries. You'll definitely be asking for at least another round or two of that. The speckled lemonade is fabulous! It is sweet and has lots of sliced strawberries floating at the bottom of the drink. It also comes in a cool cup that makes it look way fancier than it really is.     Before receiving my entree - the Guacamole bacon cheeseburger - we got boneless wings for an appetizer. The "wings" more resembled chicken tenders since they were made up of chicken breast and were super crunchy. We dipped the celery and the wings in the various sauces - bbq, ranch, buffalo - that came with it and they were al pretty good. It was a typical appetizer.  Afterward came the Guac bacon burger. Instead of regular onions, I requested for grilled and they did that without any problem. The burger was stuffed to the max and had a good amount of bacon and avocado to give the cheeseburger a little extra creaminess and crunch. A side of fries also accompanied the dish which was much appreciated.  Since I went here for a group event with 40+ ppl sitting together, I could understand why their service was a little rushed and not as attentive. They were real busy. At this location, there is plenty of parking and plenty of the room in the restaurant for big parties. Furthermore, this Red Robin is close to South Coast so if you're looking for an all-American meal filled with decadent burgers and fried goodies, check this place out!
Jade was our fabulous server with exceptional service and Jill (the manager) was very welcoming and accommodating! Thank you!

Came here with my girlfriend for my birthday two nights ago. We sat in the bar and the service was just ridiculous. I always tip and I couldn't even let myself tip the full amount.  We were not greeted or dealt with in a friendly manner by anyone working the bar area. We waited so long for our second serving of fries that we decided we better just leave, so we did. There was just no level of customer service; it was actually embarrassing. I really love R.R., but I don't see myself coming back to this location.

Surprisingly delicious! We haven't been to Red Robin in years but decided to stop by and give it a try. I had the Billion Dollar Baby burger and my husband had the Burnin' Love burger.   The Billion burger was very yummy, the crispy potato cake and the hint of truffle really paired well with the saltiness of the bacon and cheese. Good overall balance of flavors but the burger itself was so big, my husband ended up having to help me finish it. The Burnin' burger could have been spicier, it's good but a bit boring. He had the side of broccoli and I had the garlic herb fries which were tasty! ! Very garlicky but it's been cooked with a little soy sauce giving it an Asian twist. I had the freckled lemonade which was a touch too sweet, I would have liked a more pronounced lemon flavor - it was so faint if you told me there was no lemon in it, I'd have believed you. And to end our meal, we shared a kiddie sundae with some chocolate syrup, whipped cream, sprinkles and a cherry. A delightful end to our meal. Big props to Andrew, who did a great job of checking in on us without being intrusive, dude was like a ninja! He'd appear suddenly with a refill of your drink just when you notice you're getting low. He was super nice and did his job well. I salute you, sir!  Overall, Red Robin is a good burger place.

This was our first time in since they renivated, looks nice but the food was not good. Had a long wait to get our food and it tasted like it had sat around for a while. Chicken was rubbery and the fries were only slightly warm. I don't think we will be back.
It gets crazy busy on the weekends, but everyone is usually really friendly, I love their fries and Boca patty burgers are good too.

Amazing!!! Let's start with the greetings as soon as we entered. Happy, pleasant hostess!  Thankfully, not crazy busy (8:45 pm), so we got seated right away. Amberly was our server. Talk about perfection!!! She took our drink order immediately after introducing herself. She then brought them over right away and asked extremely kindly if we were ready to order. We eat here at least 15 times a year. So we knew exactly what to get. As requested, she brought fries to our table ASAP. Food was amazing and fresh. Our drinks were refilled without a request. Extra basket of fries came out hot. Wow, Amberly! Classic definition of perfect service. Literally everything was perfect. All night, the best service we could have asked for. The reason for this review... it was pouring rain and Amberly ran my debit card out to me. Pouring rain! I had totally forgotten it on the table. She ran out, waived us down, we rolled down the window thinking it must be a problem with our check (bill). She handed the card over with a smile and a sweet exchange of words. I mean, this amazing young woman is working hard this holiday season! Soooo thankful for her kindness, attention to detail, and going above and beyond to KEEP US COMING BACK!  Yuuuuummmmmmmm!!!
Service and food was horrendous.  The menu pictures are LIES...burgers are nothing like the pictures.  Go to Jack 'n The Box!

From San Diego and made a random pit stop to eat. From walking to walking out service was incredible! Our Server Ricky was attentive and asked if we needed anything multiple times. Bartender came by with my moms full beer, and be the keg ran out on my beer, he gave me what there was and came back with a full 22oz. That's just great customer service. We were also checked on by different team members! Food was amazing as well! Customer service makes everything more enjoyable!

Great service evertime we go. Only reason I gave 4 stars is the last 2 times I went they had a leak going on and buckets in the lobby, but to the than that great service always told wait time, servers are friendly dona great job at checking in keep our drinks full. And they even are patient when my 6 year old son takes his time ordering with them.

Great service from our waitress. I informed her we were in a hurry and she took our order and delivered everything promptly. One mistake was she misunderstood our order of mac and cheese and brought a cheeseburger instead but it was fixed. She was around when we needed more drinks and sauces. Food was good.

We ended up here after trying out a different place! The waitress was super quick and friendly. Decent food options.. maybe I have been here to many times, because I was bored. It's an okay place to have happy hour, but now a day we have so many options that this place seams bland.
Great food Great service  Great prices Sit in the bar or the restaurant  Servers: Jesse, cami, Pricilla
Lunch special was ok. (Traditional cheeseburger) Had a cold Heineken!! Fast service! Good price!
Had a great pineapple/teriyaki burger -- love that they ask how you want it cooked...and do it!

Recent eating experience last week at this Red Robin was a total disappointment and below any acceptable standards.  Stopped at lunch time and wife and I ordered two malts, chocolate and vanilla.  Wife ordered soup and chicken wrap, I ordered prime rib dip sandwich.  Malts arrived could barely tell the difference between chocolate and vanilla..chocolate was very light tan.  The vanilla malt tasted like blended vanilla ice cream, no malt flavor.  Sent the vanilla back, received another one but this time malt added but not blended..malt powder just barely mixed. While pouring remainder of chocolate from the blending cup, a portion spilled onto the table.  It required clean-up but several servers passed by our table, looked and kept on walking.  Finally our server came back and we requested assistance with clean-up, she left and came back with several paper napkins which were not sufficient to clean it up.  She left again and came back with more paper napkins and wiped the table leaving a sticky residue.  We had expected she would come back with a damp towel  but that didn't happen.  The soup with the chicken wrap was a very small bowel, much smaller than normal and the chicken in the wrap was dry.  We have eaten and numerous Red Robins and have found them to be good but this one was terrible.  We had a $50.00 bill and came away very disappointed with the food quality and service.  We will not be returning.
Have been sitting here for over 10 minutes employees keep passing us but no one asks us if we want anything to drink or introduce themselves - WORST service

The staff at this location was amazing. Our server Jessie was very polite and attentive to our needs.  When our served asked if I knew what I wanted I replied "the egg one" to which she heard "A-1".  When the wrong burger came out and we discovered the mix up Jessie and the Manager David leapt into action.  The order was corrected and my burger was ready in under 5 minutes. A simple misunderstanding, turned into one of my best dining experiences in a long time.  Burger was delicious, bottomless garlic fries where amazing and the drinks were never empty.  Great job guys, I wish all places handled business in this manner.
i came here for the first time everyone was really friendly i loved it the food is so bomb best burger i ever had

I went with a group of girl friends to have dinner and some drinks - you know to have the girl talk. The place is Ok, a little bit loud, spacious and the waiters are ver nice and friendly. I wasn't a big fan of the food; I had like a fruit non-alcoholic drink along with guacamole and chips. I wasn't super hungry but I was craving for something sweet so I decided to look at the desserts menu but nothing seemed appealing. Prices are very standard as well.

I worked at Red Robin during college and absolutely loved the food. As the years have passed I now live near this Red Robin by South Coast Mall.  And sad to say the times we have eaten there the food is not what I remembered it.  And we have tried giving it another chance like we did last night. The Cajun clucks and fries where not good. Chicken strikes where small and only 4 pieces came with it. I thought it was six pieces. And the fries where old and not fresh. The milk shake was to thick.  Customer Service was great , just need to work in that food.

After a horrible experience at the foothill ranch location, we passed by and decided to attempt using our birthday burgers again.  We seated ourselves in the bar area and were greeted right away.  Ordered a beer and cocktail, the A1 peppercorn burger and the whiskey river chicken burger.   Our food was served hot and fresh and tasted great. Service was fine and checking out on the little tablet is super easy too. Overall we had a good lunch and only had to pay for our drinks and tip.

3 of my orders were incorrect, my waters were not refilled, no one asked if I wanted more fries (bottomless right?). Then when I asked for boxes she came back with 4 small boxes and no bag? Happy Mothers Day!

I haven't been to this chain in decades. When I was younger and into burgers I was okay visiting this restaurant but now I rarely visit big chains like this. However, my visit here was not so bad after all.  The food was pretty good but the service was awful, that's the only reason why I docked a star. My friend who is a vegetarian loves this place because they will switch any of their burgers to a veggie patty, which is a very nice touch. I'm not vegetarian but I do try to eat on the healthier side so I was happy to see the last page of the menu had tips to a healthier meal. For example, the menu suggested substituting the fries for a side of veggies and ordering their smaller burgers. I ended up ordering the smaller burger originally 6.99 (not bad!) and substituted the burger for a slightly larger size (8.99) just so I could have it with a chicken breast instead of red meat. The burger bun was toasted to perfection. It was definitely smaller then their other burgers. It was similar to the size of a fast-food burger only the meat was much higher quality. The waitress must have been having a bad day because we were practically the only people in the restaurant (5 o' clock on a weekday) so it's not like she was being overworked at the moment and we weren't rude or problematic at all. After the food came she never checked up on us and we had to use the little call button to get her attention so we could have a refill on our endless fries. Seems much better than it is if you eat regular portions. First they give you a tiny bit to start and then if you have to wait for the waiter to bring a few more by the time you are done with your meal you don't need any more fries. The fries are nothing special. Nothing addicting like at other restaurant chains. To summarize, lower your expectations and you will be satisfied. I may be back, it definitely replaced our rare visits to other major restaurant chains.
Great burgers & other sandwiches.  Friendly staff and Red Robin is Veteran friendly. Andrew does a great job keeping the drinks refilled even before you run out.
Food was good. Cronuts were even better! Our waiter Andrew did a great job to meet the needs of my needy friend Brenda. She's a mess.

Great value for the price. 5 stars for the food, plus bottomless fries are definitely a plus. Glad the seasoned salt is still the same. The honey BBQ dipping sauce was great too! Reminded me of chic-Fil-a sauce. The BBQ dipping sauce was really good. I had the sriracha burger and it was great with the spicy aioli. Cons...tables around us weren't bussed the entire time we ate. Server seemed in a rush the whole time but it was super slow...she also wanted us to order our appetizers on the tablet. Plus we paid the bill through said tablet. Seems like these tablets were trying to replace the servers. Not a big fan and took away from the whole experience... Probably won't be coming back.

Unfortunately it should be 0 stars -  I've been to several other Red Robin locations - always had a great experience, food and service have previously been great. Unfortunately on this trip to this location, as we were being seated, we noticed roaches around our chairs. That was enough for us to leave the restaurant.
I love the royal Red Robin burger.  Service is always great and love the unlimited fries.

Came to have lunch with my kids. We normally visit this location and get great service but today was not so great they took for ever to get our drinks. Then when we received the food I felt robbed I could have gotten them same burger at McDonalds for a cheaper price. So disappointed.  Bacon was horrible never will I return to this place I will rather go to mcdonalds and get the same burger.

This Red Robin's was amazing! The hostess were super nice! It was my 21st birthday and we were a party of 15! Our server I think her name was velet or velvet something with a V but she was amazing! Couldn't ask for a better server... I wish we could've tipped her more last night, but we want to go back and give her more of a better tip and a small gift for being so amazing... so if management sees this if you guys could please reply because we would really like her name so we could go back to give her her tip and stuff. Absolutely amazing... she really made my birthday special! :D

The food here is always good but the service needs work with. They'll come and take your order then disappear only to bring you your food. We needed refills and the waiter wasn't anywhere near us. Smh!

We went in last night after my friends graduation she's becoming a nurse so we wanted to take her out, we were seated after 30-45 minutes mind you it was not busy. Our hostess seemed miserable I mean if you don't like you're job why are you there? Once we placed our drinks and food order we were specific to what we wanted. She messed up quite a few orders wasn't busy but she was rushing asked for the medium well my burger was so burnt it felt like I was eating rubber she brought fries instead of onion rings even though we were billed for onion rings didn't bring refills of fries until we asked we ate around 8:30? Left till 10:30 we spent over 100 dollars and left a good tip even though she didn't deserve it tried to separate the bill told us to figure it out on he tablet. Uh okay?
Very good burger for a decent price, service was a little slow. Overall a very good value.
first of all i agree with many of the reviews the "tablet systen" is a little weird but overall good food. its more then u wld think to eat herre but overall you will enjot tour food

the service here is amazing !! I've been here a number of times and no matter who the server is, I get approached quickly, get my food quickly, and never have to ask for much! That is the epitome of good service, when the server knows what you want before you have to ask!

My rating is solely based off of the exemplary customer service from our server Alix. She saved this experience and this company should count themselves lucky to have her as a member or their team. Even though she was spread so thin, she made sure to connect with my party and make sure our needs were met. She is the reason I will be returning to this location. This is one of those times I'm hoping corporate is reviewing what's being put out there. This gal should be recognized and used as a model for customer service coaching. Treat her well, Red Robin!

Have always loved Red Robin but after last nights experience I'm not sure I'll be going back to this location. Brought a family of 6 to celebrate a birthday and experienced sub par customer service. Dinner was decent but dessert was not even edible. Cheesecake was served frozen straight from the freezer and the chocolate brownie cake was so hard we couldn't get a spoon into it. Our server seemed rushed the whole time and trying to get assistance was very difficult. On our way out the birthday boy expressed that this was the worst dining experience of his life.... not how we hoped his birthday night would go.

Walked in  at 5:00.  Tattooed girl at hostess table was on the phone taking a phone in order. After 5 minutes of listening to her discussing what kind of cheese the caller wanted on their burger and laughing and talking about other issues I started drumming my fingers on the desk. She then cupped the phone and pointed up to the bar and said there is open seating up there. Mind you there was probably 10 customers in the whole place. I said I'd like a booth. She went back to talking on the phone and it now appeared that she was talking with a friend. She did not acknowledge me after that but did acknowledge a co-worker come in from outside carrying what appeared to be two cans of Red Bull which he gave her one and she said thank you. Again no acknowledgement of me and my girlfriend.  Meanwhile another couple came in and the girl with the ugly tattoos kept talking on the phone and ignored them also. Several other employees walked by and no one wanted to help us customers.  We then walked out.  No service no sale!  Won't return. Ever.

DELISH!!!!  I had The Royal Robin and the beef patty was so smokey and paired nicely with the bacon and fried egg!  The best burger I've had here yet. The server was pleasant, but with the tabletop kiosk, the four I'm our party were soon neglected. Of course ONE refill was provided for each of our drinks, but the bottomless fries found a bottom immediately as they were never refilled. Three stars are solely for the burger, service hmm... Obligatory at best. ....Possibly why we were quickly ushered to the bar where service is next to nil opposed to the dining area.  Providing servers time to flirt and text on their cell phones in plain view.  A now increasingly common issue of teenage management.

So when ordering the Marco Polo "Burger", make sure you get an actual ham burger otherwise, you get a Chicken sandwich that they call burger. I've never heard the term chicken burger, and I'm a foodie, but they assured me that people come in there all the time and ask for chicken burgers, which if the chicken was ground like burger meat I could might understand that, but all in all, The Marco Polo Burger is actually a chicken sandwich unless other specified. I think they need to collaborate with Chic-fila -- they might be on to something. The chicken burger/sandwich wasn't good. The service on the phone was bad. The online order menu lets you choose the burger patty where on the phone they did not ask.

Tonight our 2 1/2 year old was served a HUGE piece of plastic in her Mac n cheese, not cool. They didn't bother to even comp the kids meal and a manager never came over no nothing. Lost good regular customers here as it's right by our house. Um not how you handle serving plastic to a kid and clearly you have no quality control and no one looks at what is being served.

I've been a long time fan of Red Robin, particularly at this location as the food and service are wonderful.  When the company went through their changes a few years ago (new decor, menus, etc.), they lost some of my favorite aspects of their cuisine, but they've since gone back to their earlier menu and portions so I'm a happy camper again!  Great food & really fun too!

I'm currently visiting the city for a work conference. I work in the restaurant industry which makes a bit more critical than others. I wasn't greet by anymore at the host stand so I came straight to the bar. It's dinner so the bar is full and I waited about 4 minutes for my server. Andrew is wonderful. He is the type of server I like, quick, quiet and efficient... definitely is an asset to the restaurant

Our server was less than par. Server took like forever to get to our table, then had to explain that the fries were made to order...  first off I didn't ask.  Our normal server, Maddie is a rockstar...but we weren't sitting in her area. Lisa was great, a hostess I believe, also a rockstar!  Maddie found us and made up for the horrible service we were receiving.  Food was good, hot and fresh!  Not sure what was up with our server, but hey...not all people are meant to be servers!

Let me start by saying I,have been too many. RedRobins. So I have given thm plenty of my money,and never said anything about it. So that being written,bottomless fries,,I don't think so,I had to tell my server numerous times. At so many locations,please another order of fries,az soon as I place my order,and it always takes forever. If ur going to advertise bottomless,B about it. Last time I ever visit this restaurant, When me and my family see a RedRobin we laugh and say lesson learned. Oh yeah,bottomless doesn't mean 5 fries in a basket. Please I've been too many Mom&Pop burger restaurants,and thy never offer bottomless,but thy certainly give u enough in one basket. Beware Bottomless....

Quality of food has gone way downhill. First of all, I order a water with lemon. I get a brown, rotten lemon wedge. (How do you not see that?) We were sitting at the bar, and I watched the server dig around the lemon bucket in an effort to find another lemon. He took the bucket to the back and procured a decent lemon. At that point, I was ready to toll him to skip the lemon. Next, we ordered pretzel bites for an appetizer. They were sitting in a pool of grease and the cheese sauce was kinda burnt and brownish. Our lunch came within seconds of the appetizer. I ordered a chicken bruschetta sandwich on ciabatta roll. The chicken itself was good, but the roll was fall apart soggy, with lettuce to match. I ditched the bun and ate the chicken. I did not complain since it was free for my birthday. I upgraded to parmesan garlic fries. About 2 wedges had garlic parmesan on them and the rest were plain and not crispy  at all. I don't think I will be frequenting Red Robin any time in the foreseeable future.

For a chain restaurant where various locations could have varying degrees of quality, this specific Red Robin has never disappointed! The food and service are good, and the place often gets crowded on a weekend evening. The quality is very consistent and always hits the spot when I'm craving a solid burger and fries!

Ordinarily I dont have bad things to say about this place but tonight was absolutely horrible. The l hostess completely forgot our group of 5 literally 10 minutes after she had told us that it would be "just a few more minutes." When we went to ask what was the delay as we clearly saw spaces in the dining room,  the same hostess said she thought our group had been seated already. Extremely upsetting because of the overall wait time. All I'm saying is take better care of your customers, please.
My local Red Robin is so noisy that I don't go there too often; this one did not have that problem.  Our server was perky and fun.  Our food was as expected.
Miriah was our waitress and was great. She checked on us often, even though it was busy and a large party. The food was good. The atmosphere was great. We will definitely come back!

It's been about a decade since I've visited a Red Robin Gourmet Burgers.  This particular location is located across the street from South Coast Plaza.  My co-workers and I were promptly seated at a booth and ordered a burger from their specially priced tavern menu.  3 specially priced burgers were included in the menu:  red's tavern, sir acha tavern, and taco tavern.  I went with the sir acha tavern. Sir Acha Tavern ($7) - This burger comes with 2 fire-grilled patties with a  combo of sriracha onion straws, spicy aioli, American cheese, tomato, lettuce and pickles on a sesame seed bun.  It also includes bottomless steak fries.  I'm not a fan of American cheese so I substituted it with cheddar cheese.  While the burger isn't that big, I was surprised at how juicy the burger was and how great it tasted.  I loved the bit of crunch provided by the crispy onions in the burger.  The spicy aioli wasn't spicy but helped to enhance the flavor profile of the burger.   The steak fries were crispy on the outside and after the manager replenished my basket of fries I was full.   Overall I thought this was an exceptional deal for burgers and fries.  While the burger is a little on the small side it's definitely one of the better tasting ones out there.  I will definitely be back when I'm craving a burger.

Walked in to Red Robin as it looked empty. All clear tables and we though we would be seated fast.  There where only two parties waiting and they told us that it would take 20-25 minutes. Last time we came to this location they called the manager as I asked why it would take so long when there were so many tables open, and the person at the front table didn't even know how to respond.  We needed up leaving and the manager called me to apologize. I didn't even want to ask this time why 25 minutes if most tables were clear, so we just ended up leaving and went to Jack In The Box.  It's ridiculous that one is to wait 25 minutes when all tables are clear!!!! This location's Service has suffered so much lately! Don't know if they are under new management or they have new employees.  You know It's bad when my kids who happen to love Red Robin say to leave and go somewhere else! We come to this location too often and I think it's time we rethink our burgers joints better!

It had been a while and forgot how amazing the food here was! I recently visited last Sunday and enjoyed a delicious salad and afterwards was encouraged by the server to try an amazing cheesecake for desert. I am having trouble remembering the name of the tasty southwest flavor salad I ordered but the most appreciated part of my diner that night was the server Celine. Her service was second to non and totally made my day. She was helpful, friendly, made me feel comfortable and I observed how she catered to the needs of every customer so gracefully and made sure my cup was never empty. I was impressed and to say the least my experience was amazing! I hope she will be there next time around!
Worst experience at a Red Robin ever! Found a hair in my burger, bad service. They also left our table like this for 15 minutes. I May add it was slow, now I know why!

I have to say that while I have BEEN to a red robin before, I had never EATEN here before. My last visit to a red robin (not this location) I came with a party of 4 they all immediately knew what they wanted as they were regulars, but I needed a few moments to check the menu, causing a rather rude server to roll her eyes and walk away,NEVER RETURNING! Bus boys came to drop off food, no drinks were ever refilled or anyone cared to talk to us again. I had thought "F this corporation forever" but my girlfriend wanted to go so we came,and I'm glad we did. At this location, our server Matthew was incredibly friendly, good on refilling drinks and sauce, even checking on us when he was clearly busy with a full section. Two thumbs way way up for him. I may just come back here (not the other place) for my next burger craving!

We decidee to come out for a quick bite to eat and came to this store. To our surprise we were seated as soon as we walked in the door and we were served by a woman by the name of velvet she was an absolute delight. She was on top of her game today and took real good care of us. The food we ordered was out-freakin-standing as well. We had a very nice experience today and if the  management reads these i would like it if you would thank the entire staff for us they made our little outting very fun !!!

Wow the servce slow and forget about the bottenless frys I mentioned to johann or server when he brought us our food to bring us another order of these bottomless frys because  notice on my plate I had like 8 steak frys ( Seriously) well as I mention at the beginning the service was slow..well behold the frys never came..and while there nor did he come by to check if we needed anything only to pickup the plates and I mention to him about not getting these so called bottomless frys and the words that came out of his mouth was Oh sorry about that and left with the plates.....well red robin I'll I have to say is retrain your  staff to be attenitive to your guest.   This is why I gave you a 2 stars (staff not attenitive to the guest)

I came here with my friends for a small reunion and it was a fantastic choice. The turkey burger was delicious (and was everyone's favorite).  What was even better was the customer service, our server Jade was attentive and fast. We were also helped by the host Itzel who helped us with an issue on separating the check when it wasn't her responsibility.  Overall, this location was a great experience and the customer service is on point.

I've been coming to this location since I was a kid. A nice dinner out sounded great, every time I have come fries would be offered for an appetizer, we did not get offered and didn't bring any. The waitress wasn't the brightest and we asked for our check to be spit between the two groups and it came back on the same receipt and very frustrating for us. Lastly we played trivia on the device and didn't even know it would charge us. I enjoyed the food but the waitress was very frustrating and the experience was a strange one.

Well maintained draft beer lines and system equals  consistently good quality tasting pours. Lots of bars get this wrong so often. RR doesn't. And this is across all restaurants I've visited.  Consistency goes a long way. Also this particular branch has superb service at the bar area. I always get quick and very friendly service.

This was my first time here, and the burgers are so good. The cheese sticks are amazing too, so don't miss them. We had Jesse as our waitress, and she's super funny and a great server.  Nice job Jesse!
